# Robots.txt for Vouch Mobile
# https://vouchmobile.com

# Allow all crawlers to access all content
User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://vouchmobile.com/sitemap.xml

# Crawl-delay suggestion for polite crawling
Crawl-delay: 1

# Block access to any admin or development directories (if they exist)
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /.git/
Disallow: /node_modules/
# CI test
